sprykerComponent.name: packaging-unit-cart
sprykerComponent.readme: Displays product quantity and amount on checkout cart step.

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
amount: required,
    quantity: required,
    quantitySalesUnit: required,
    quantityConversion: required,
    quantityProductMeasurementUnit: required,
    amountSalesUnit: required,
    amountConversion: required,
    amountProductMeasurementUnit: required
